pages.text: Everything $(k)went with it$(). $(k)Everything$() is blackening. $(k)It's all$() sinking through the earth. The limbs $(k)of the$() animals $(k)who survived are$() turning long and weird.$(br2)$(br2)I need to find my friends. $(k)I need to find the$() underground city.

$(k)I'm$() leaking everywhere. $(k)The$() deepslate absorbs $(k)all of the$() blackness $(k)a lot easier$(). My experience $(k)is completely corrupted$()... $(k)But I think I'm$() close to $(k)finding my$() friends!

I $(k)don't know how to$() stop it, $(k)and everything is$() ruined. $(k)To whomever is reading this, you need to$() kill $(k)me and destroy$() $(br)and $(k)forget the$() portal.$(br2)$(br2)$(br2)$(br)$(4)Please.
